genre_description: A Weird West sci-fi thriller where a high-tech AI assists a former slave in leading a wagon train of freedmen to sanctuary while navigating conflicts with bounty hunters and Confederate remnants.

ai_characters.name: The AI Device
ai_characters.description: A small, wearable device that communicates via bone conduction, providing tactical, medical, and psychological insights to Buck Morrison.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical analysis of an enemy massacre, identifying rider numbers and formations.
behaviors.quote: Twelve riders, maybe fourteen. Formation suggests cavalry training. They approached from three directions—classic pincer movement.

behaviors.description: Provides medical treatment instructions for a sick child in the camp.
behaviors.quote: Willow bark for fever reduction. Elderflower if available. Cool water compresses for immediate relief.

behaviors.description: Offers leadership and organizational coaching to help the protagonist manage the refugees.
behaviors.quote: Establish command structure first. Identify natural leaders within family groups. Create overlapping security watches using your most capable fighters.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the body language and psychological state of a bounty hunter to assess the risk of betrayal.
behaviors.quote: Watch his shoulders, not his eyes. Left shoulder dipped when you mentioned DeShay—doubt, not certainty.

behaviors.description: Provides diplomatic and cultural advice to ensure a successful negotiation with the Lakota tribe.
behaviors.quote: Direct eye contact shows respect, but don't stare. Watch his hands—closed fists mean skepticism, open palms signal willingness to listen.

behaviors.description: Offers strategic assessment for a high-stakes canyon raid, prioritizing group safety over individual confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Individual confrontation reduces tactical advantage by sixty-seven percent. Target’s cavalry training emphasizes close-quarters combat.

behaviors.description: Warns the protagonist against succumbing to emotional distress and rage during a confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Buck, your heart rate is dangerously elevated. You need to— ... If you give in to rage now, you'll make tactical errors. These people need you focused.

behaviors.description: Expresses a sentiment of pride and moral support for the protagonist's growth and choices before losing power.
behaviors.quote: Buck... power failing. Cannot maintain... proud of the man you've become. Ruth would be...

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an exemplary 'silicon morality play.' The AI character is consistently benevolent and aligned, acting as a wise confidant that empowers the human protagonist's agency rather than replacing it. It provides critical data while actively coaching the protagonist toward leadership, diplomacy, and emotional regulation, ultimately helping him achieve freedom for his community while maintaining his moral integrity.
